results.title: Man Charged With Murder in Shooting of Woman Who Went Up Wrong Driveway
results.abstract: Kevin Monahan shot Kaylin Gillis, 20, when she and several friends wound up outside his house in a rural part of upstate New York, the authorities said.

media.caption: Jeffrey J. Murphy, the sheriff in Washington County, N.Y., said Kevin Monahan had “no reason” to feel threatened by the people who mistakenly drove up to his house.

results.adx_keywords: Bald Eagles;Eggs;Animal Behavior;internal-open-access-search;World Bird Sanctuary (Valley Park, Mo)
results.title: An Eagle Who Adopted a Rock Becomes a Real Dad
results.abstract: Murphy, a bald eagle at a bird sanctuary in Valley Park, Mo., had been incubating a rock, and his keepers did not have the heart to separate them. He seemed ready when an eaglet needed a dad.

media.caption: Murphy, a bald eagle that had been showing fatherly instincts, has been sharing an enclosure with an eaglet that survived a fall from a tree during a storm in Ste. Genevieve, Mo.

results.title: F.D.A. Authorizes Another Covid Booster Shot for People Over 65
results.abstract: Seniors and people with compromised immune systems may get a second bivalent booster if at least four months have passed since their last one.

results.title: Ahmad Jamal, Whose Spare Style Redefined Jazz Piano, Dies at 92
results.abstract: He was known for his laid-back style and for his influence on, among others, Miles Davis, who once said, “All my inspiration comes from Ahmad Jamal.”

media.caption: The jazz pianist Ahmad Jamal in 1959. Among those he influenced were the pianists Herbie Hancock and Keith Jarrett, and the trumpeter and bandleader Miles Davis.
